hooks.command: /usr/bin/osascript -e "display notification 'Awaiting your input' with title 'Claude Code'"

statusLine.command: input=$(cat); model=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name // "Claude"'); dir=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir // ""'); dir_name=$([ -n "$dir" ] && basename "$dir" || echo ""); git_branch=""; if [ -n "$dir" ] && ([ -d "$dir/.git" ] || git -C "$dir" rev-parse --git-dir >/dev/null 2>&1); then git_branch=$(git -C "$dir" -c core.filemode=false -c advice.detachedHead=false branch --show-current 2>/dev/null || echo ""); fi; CYAN='\033[36m'; GREEN='\033[32m'; BLUE='\033[34m'; RESET='\033[0m'; left_side=""; left_plain=""; if [ -n "$dir_name" ]; then left_side="${CYAN}${dir_name}${RESET}"; left_plain="$dir_name"; if [ -n "$git_branch" ]; then left_side="${left_side} on ${GREEN}${git_branch}${RESET}"; left_plain="${left_plain} on ${git_branch}"; fi; fi; right_side="${BLUE}Sonnet 4.5${RESET}"; right_plain="Sonnet 4.5"; term_width=${COLUMNS:-80}; left_len=${#left_plain}; right_len=${#right_plain}; total_len=$((left_len + right_len)); if [ $total_len -lt $term_width ]; then padding=$((term_width - total_len)); printf "%b%${padding}s%b\n" "$left_side" "" "$right_side"; else printf "%b %b\n" "$left_side" "$right_side"; fi
